website_summaries.verdict: Able to accurately hit small targets at up to 1,400 fps with an alloy pellet, this is an excellent air rifle for pest control.
pros: Easy to adjust sights for quick and precise shots
Your choice of .177 and .22 caliber models
cons: It takes more upper body strength than you may expect to cock this rifle

customer_reviews.title: Every survivalist should have at least one of two
customer_reviews.text: The absolute very best air rifle you can buy for the price. Every weapons cache should have at least one great air rifle. I replaced the scope with a new one and this rifle is a must have. It’s fairly quite but does break sound barrier but you need one because the ammo is dirt cheap and will kill all small game and YouTube shows it killing a hog and deer. This is a must have for your rifle collection I have two air rifles and thousands of pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Solid build, good power, good scope
customer_reviews.text: Sighted in with just a few shots. As others mentioned the scope is more than good enough, tried the open sights before mounting the scope they’re pretty good too. Solid feel, good trigger especially for an inexpensive air gun. Hit a red solo cup at 75 yards 2 of 4 attempts (gun rested on a pillow) and when at that range it has good power. That power was confirmed shooting an Arnold Palmer Tea jug filled with water; big exit rip and cracked all of the plastic on half the container. The video is just us goofing around blowing up a soda. Who hasn’t done that?😎
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Practical practice, great first rifle
customer_reviews.text: Well made with nice finish. Louder than expected when shot. Can get hard to pump after a couple dozen shots. Good and cheap way to refine rifle and scope use skills. This is not a toy but would make a great gift for a young person to learn the rules of the range and safe firearms handling. Better than a Red Ryder. I doubt many younger children could cock it without adult help. Built in supervision. Ruger nameplate means quality unit.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the quality and power
customer_reviews.text: The rifle is a bit heavy but well made. I sighted it in and it seems accurate. The force needed to cock it is hefty for a lady. However , I am pleased with the quality and power. J.D.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry E. Diebel

customer_reviews.title: quality rifle, scope ... not so much
customer_reviews.text: Ruger lives up to its name with this air rifle; easy to handle, well built, solid. Iron sights were close from the factory. The scope on the other hand ... stinks. Defective right out of the box. The cross hairs rotate each time the rifle is shot. Call Umarex and shipping and handling are on ME! Really? That's just not right. Hindsight ..and for you (the reader) ... buy a rifle without a scope and go get a quality scope.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley A. Kottas

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This airgun has turned into a real joy to use. It's reasonably accurate ( 1 inch groups at 27.5 yards ) and very powerful. I have used it for small game hunting with great success. It did have a long break in period during which the cocking effort was very difficult and the trigger was a bit gritty. After about 500 rounds it has smoothed out, cocks easier and accuracy is good and getting better. This is an adult airgun because of the cocking effort and it is heavy at over 10 lbs. scoped. Overall I would recommend it to anyone looking for a budget airgun that performs at a high level.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Melts The Damn Thing Down
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to guns regardless of the caliber or cost if the damn thing can’t shoot straight right outta the box the wez gots a problem. This Ruger .22cal Air Magnum is a Piece Of She It. It could not shoot straight no matter what pellets they tell you to use. I even went to “Ole Faithful” my shooting rest and strapped Ruger in for its flight tests. This gun was all over the place, All OVER THE PLACE. Stay Clear Of This POS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ruger should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible accuracy, 6” pattern at 30yds with vise. Kicks like a mule. The rifle ceased to function after 20 rounds. Very heavy and longer than is comfortable for a 5’8” person. The front blade sight also obscures the scope reticle with the included mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gun
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the scope, couldn't seem to get it sighted in is all over the place. Barrel sites same to work just fine, if I was guessing there's probably just a tiny bit of play between the barrel and the stock making the scope not accurate, but that's just a guess. This gun is very powerful, shot through a metal trashcan no problem, but would not penetrate the bed on my truck; but that seems about right.
customer_reviews.author: Landon P

customer_reviews.title: Whats not to like. Performs like a rws 350 magnum for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Whats not to like. Performs like a rws 350 magnum for a lot less $$$. The only con, is the weight with a scope is 3lbs. heavier than my deer rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great air rifle. This rifle easily takes down squirrels. The accuracy on it is amazing. The scope of course is not very good, but it does not take away from how ell this gun shoots. It handles heavy pellets very well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cable

customer_reviews.title: Ruger - always a great value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for the price but the scope leaves a lot to be desired. If you like good optics you will be disappointed with the sights. However the rifle is a good, sturdy, hard hitting piece. I like it better than my .177 cal that I paid twice as much for.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, sturdy, heavy and difficult to break
customer_reviews.text: Large and heavy, really difficult to break to pump. I'm a 61 y/o female and it's all I can do to use this gun.
customer_reviews.author: Psyaya

customer_reviews.title: A great guy
customer_reviews.text: This rifle is a beast. It's extremely accurate. The scope is is a little week. So I did replace that with a better one. If you're looking for a air rifle With an attitude. This is for you.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth davis

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful, accurate and loud.
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and extremely accurate. It is very loud though. Not comfortable shooting in my backyard in a subdivision.
customer_reviews.author: Marine74

customer_reviews.title: Bang For Your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I've only shot it on 2 separate occasions. So, not zeroed in yet on the sights. But, in adjusting, it's moving my shot pattern as it should be. I can attest to one thing for sure though. This rifle is powerful! More so than I expected. I'm very impressed and pleased.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rifle
customer_reviews.text: Great gun and very accurate if you don't use the supplied crap scope. I will buy a new scope at a later time but it shoots dead on with the open sights. No complaints with the rifle. Love it. I Hate the cheap scope. That's why I gave it 4 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's awesome.!
customer_reviews.text: plain and simple,it's awesome.!!!! never had one this strong and accurate.I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super gun!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't shot it much, it's like the rabbits and squirrels found out that I got a more powerful gun, and disappeared!! It seems very powerful and accurate, which is what I wanted. Very nice, big, HEAVY pellet rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bruggeman

customer_reviews.title: Jt's a bear to cock, but it dispatches pests quick, humanly, and effectively.
customer_reviews.text: Serves my purposes well. Don't think you will be able to quietly dispatch any pests in the neighborhood because it's as loud as a .22 rimfire. Raccoons, possum, squirrel one shot no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Canines2kids

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good rifle
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the money. Sorry my favorite is on the bottom and won't let me post a review.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this gun
customer_reviews.text: It's a a good quality heavy gun. Powerful, kinda loud, shoots .22 JSB exact jumbo 15.89 gr verry well. They group good and are heavy enough not to go supersonic. The scope is pretty good, It works good up to about 30 yds. I bought 2 guns and am very happy with both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Done
customer_reviews.text: nice feel well balanced and added red/grn dot scope and bore sighted and well hits the little circles on the targets when you aim at them so i guess that's a good thing.very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: UpwrdMblty

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with this scope. Instead re-name this the pellet cannon. 150' dead on. Lot's of fun to shoot. If there is a down side, one must be Hulk Hogan to cock this rifle. More I shoot, the easier it is becoming however.
customer_reviews.author: MarkfromMaine

customer_reviews.title: Great air rifle!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air rifle. Very accurate and Powerful. If the scope is installed properly and sighted in incorrectly it will work for you every time. It's the best one I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Cole

customer_reviews.title: ADIOS VARMINTS !
customer_reviews.text: I own several firearms, love to shoot & have won many shooting contests. Even though this is an air gun its accuracy is amazing....I believe I could "drive nails ' from 50 feet with this rifle, perfect varmint eliminator !
customer_reviews.author: norbert lyssy

customer_reviews.title: It does sound like a 22 when you shoot and you better have ...
customer_reviews.text: This rifle is a beast, fast, hard and accurate shooter. It does sound like a 22 when you shoot and you better have a little muscle to cock it, so beware of that.
customer_reviews.author: ACER

customer_reviews.title: Great air rifle
customer_reviews.text: Kinda heavy but definitely gets the job done... I use it for squirrel hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Blizzzard

customer_reviews.title: dont buy this gun
customer_reviews.text: before you buy this or the 22 cal version make shure to watch the real reviews on yutube this gun is well put together and that is it
customer_reviews.author: rick williams

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. The Gamo is better quality and it’s cheaper
customer_reviews.text: This rifle is a piece of crap and I would NOT recommend purchasing this. Mine came apart after 30 shots. Now it looks like a bolt came loose and I can’t find it so now I have a 200 dollar ornament. I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Demon Parker

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy using this rifle
customer_reviews.text: This rifle is very powerful, it's not back breaking to cock and it and it feels well built.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It feels more like a firearm than my 10/22 does
customer_reviews.text: This thing is BIG and HEAVY! It feels more like a firearm than my 10/22 does! It's very powerful and accurate, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Geek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome performance rifle!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome performance, Accuracy all in one air rifle!!!! Highly recommend... Good arm work out too!!! 👍🏻👍🏻🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my Ruger air rifle
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my Ruger air rifle. I have a garden in my back yard. I had a problem with the squirrels and rabbits, but not no more!! I would highly recommend this Ruger air rifle to anybody it's well worth it's money. Thank you for your service and I got this very quickly after ordering it. You have a happy customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Benny S.

customer_reviews.title: good air rifle over all
customer_reviews.text: very pleased over all. my son took it out of the box, took it outside and was hitting pop cans at fifty feet on the first pull. iron sights almost perfect right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great air rifle for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This air rifle is amazing! The adjustable sights were almost dead on out of the box. It's a little heavy but I think that makes it really steady. Almost a lazer beam at 30 yards
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: on board sites are very accurate. Included scope does not hold adjustment and that is the only downside to this rifle. Sounds identical to a 22 cal. rifle and shoots strong! If your looking for a strong air rifle, this is it. Lots of fun and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DOC

customer_reviews.title: VERY ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, he really like this Air Rifle. Ruger makes great quality guns.
customer_reviews.author: PEG

customer_reviews.title: Buy this rifle!!
customer_reviews.text: Great !! I am a very picky SOB, and I have returned a lot . The Ruger air magnum .22 is a keeper. first I removed the stock, and lubed the spring lock tight on the screws cleaned the barrel ( very dirty) 2 drops of chamber lube, mounted my hammers 3-9x30 scope, bore sighted the rifle, took about 10 shots to sight, and holds bull very well after, and being brand new I am very impressed ! isn't picky about pellets either. very powerful air rifle. Seems very similar to my Diana 350 magnum .177 witch I love also. buy this rifle you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John Z.

customer_reviews.title: Buy at risk
customer_reviews.text: This rifle came apart on the first cock of the barrel. The detent spring and ball went flying. So much for my poor sons Christmas present. Very annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband and son love them they tell me they are right on target
customer_reviews.text: Husband and son love them they tell me they are right on target
customer_reviews.author: Carol Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: poor service
customer_reviews.text: nothing wrong with air rifle again someone stole parts from the first gun and the second finally made it the problem it was a gift and needless to say it didn't make it on time again poor service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great little pellet gun
customer_reviews.text: this gun is very accurate and a lot of fun and compared to its competitors in the same price range I personally think its a better product. yeah its made in china and yes the scope is pretty horrible but every pellet gun I've messed with in the $200 range has these same problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Hits hard and True !
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and loud just like a real 22lr, without having to wait for ammo ! Love the fiber optic sights too ! Hits hard and True !
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend using alloy pellets with this rifle without using ear ...
customer_reviews.text: The first few shoots from this gun are very loud. I would not recommend using alloy pellets with this rifle without using ear pro. Shipping was 5 days late but it shoots great, not a beginner rifle but a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lishman

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: This thing is an absolute tank. Heavier than my 20Ga Winchester 1200 (28" barrel), and almost as long. Surprisingly loud though, I wouldn't use this near houses in case you freak someone out.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Adjustments were useless. Dissapointed that Ruger would put their name to ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of ****. Could never get it to shoot a pattern, either with the scope or without, at any reasonable distance. Adjustments were useless. Dissapointed that Ruger would put their name to such a sorry piece.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M. McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Had some problems but still a nice air rifle for the price range
customer_reviews.text: This is a very hard hitting 22 cal. pellet gun. I never even put the scope on as all the reviews said it was junk. The open sights on the gun were not put on straight and the rear sight had to be moved way to the left to get it to shoot any where close. I purchased a red dot sight from Amazon and installed it on the rife. Now it shoots really good for the price range (about an inch or under at 20 yards) and still has plenty of power to take care of pests. I recommend this air rifle but you will have to put on a different scope or sight to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Rogers

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great, no problems, performs well, accurate with scope, very straight forward
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! But not for young kids.
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting a month for delivery, but based on my own gun, I submit the following... Excellent weapon! The scope is next to worthless, but using the open (fiber-optic) sights, at 75 feet, I put 3 pellets in a tin-can bottom that I covered with a nickel. Takes 50+ pounds to break (cock) the gun, and if you want good results, DON'T GO CHEAP ON THE PELLETS! Loose fitting pellets negates the purpose and effect of the rifleing. The "Predator" 8-grain Poly Tip is phenominal!
customer_reviews.author: Einar R Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Everyone I show this rifle to says the same thing... this is a pellet gun...? It feels like my 30.06 etc... very well built. You have to be a man to cock it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald K Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent killing power and accurate. I use the iron site.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Asian

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it is loud.
customer_reviews.text: Very loud, which is to be expected since the round speed is supersonic. Takes a good bit of strength to cock. Single shot. Decent scope. Excellent accuracy and killing power for a pellet gun. Not really suitable for anyone you wouldn't trust with a .22. In my opinion it is too loud to dispatch vermin in a subdivision without alarming the neighbors. Ok for a few shots now and then but if you want to do target shooting and adjust the sights etc...you'll want to take this to somewhere that tolerates regular gunfire noise.
customer_reviews.author: Allerion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this gun is the best value for a air gun that dos what it dos
customer_reviews.author: Juan J Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rifle
customer_reviews.text: Got this rifle and tried it out immediately. No disappointments except it seems that different pellets react differently in it. Hadn't noticed that much change in other rifles but this one seems to be very particular what pellet is used in it. I'm not sure but suspect that much of that is from the power the rifle has. It always shoots a nice pattern with what ever pellet I'm using but if I change pellets the pattern is in a different location. Over all, I am well pleased with the rifle and all I have to do now is get used to it and pick a pellet that I'll stay with.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Powerful air gun
customer_reviews.text: This air gun is very powerful so make sure you use proper safety equipment. Having said that, it is a very nice air gun.
customer_reviews.author: Becky J

customer_reviews.title: Airguns
customer_reviews.text: I like the Adult Ruger Air Magnum it is powerful and hits hard. It is a .177 calibered pellet gun that breaks sub-sonic speeds each time the gun is fired so it's not a backyard plinker by any means. It is a small game hunting air rifle with a heavy cocking effort required break barrel. I like the synthetic stock. Needs a sling but all in all everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: IndependentRealist

customer_reviews.title: Great for hunting small game
customer_reviews.text: Powerful Airgun. Wish it came in 25 or larger caliber. Great for hunting small game.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W. Foster, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this rifle. Watch Youtube videos before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most inaccurate weapon I have ever purchased. Looks nice, feels good, plenty of power. I tried to sight it in with and without the scope. 30 yards, you will never hit your targets bulls eye. I used a vice holding the gun steady, each shot was in a different place within a foot. After 100 rounds, never once hitting the bulls eye, I put it up. I never thought Ruger would put out a piece of s*** this bad.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Fairly Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Drives a tack two out of three shots. Could be ammunition related but I haven't found any yet that shoot consistently.
customer_reviews.author: DavidBaker

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and effective - this is no toy
customer_reviews.text: I have a .177 pellet gun I have used for squirrels with good results. However, it was useless for anything larger such as raccoons. This 22 pellet gun has been the answer. Be forewarned, it is no toy. It is a heavy gun requiring some strength to hold and load. It is also fairly loud. However, it is powerful and accurate at short range. I can't asses the rifle for any longer distance but for short distance it is highly effective. The scope it comes with is very cheaply made so if you need a scope I suggest you buy and mount a quality one. Other than that I am very pleased with this pellet gun.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Hi-po .22
customer_reviews.text: I 'm going to get one for my gun-nut brother...this is one to will to your kid. High power...for the price it's a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: CkWebb

customer_reviews.title: Umarex 2244029 Ruger Air Magnum  from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida, on a canal and was inundated with pesky iguanas destroying our plants. The rifle is powerful. You have to be fairly strong to load the break barrel mechanism. With the optical scope set this pellet rifle is deadly. Iguanas are scarce around here now. I would recommend this rifle for most varmint elimination on your property.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Really Really nice pellet gun.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made from excellent quality materials. Amazing amount of power. Pellets will go sonic and make the "crack" sound of a 22 at longer distances but at short distances it is relatively quiet. Haven't figured that out yet, it would seem the pellet is gaining velocity after it leaves the barrel. Or perhaps it just takes flight time to go sonic, either way this is one great pellet gun. It is a heavy gun but I like it that way.
customer_reviews.author: F. Varndell

customer_reviews.title: This is a decent air gun with heavier pellets used ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent air gun with heavier pellets used. The scope that comes with it is junk (did'nt even bother installing it)
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: I have had this rifle for about 6 months. I have put about 3000 rounds through it. I don't know much about these rifles but my accuracy is now about a 1 inch group( 5 shots) at 100 feet. I had to replace the scope to do this. You need a steel trap. It chewed through a 3 inch solid wood table top in just a few hundred pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: Great air rifle for the money
customer_reviews.text: This gun will shoot a group smaller than a dime at 20 yards. It will definitely accomplish the task of eliminating pests and squirrel hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good got squirrel this morning with open sights then put on scope zero in nicely
customer_reviews.author: Cory J. Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Now I have a rifle that shoots pretty darn close to the same performance as a
customer_reviews.text: As close to an actual .22 as it gets! Now I have a rifle that shoots pretty darn close to the same performance as a .22LR without hunting for ammo.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Draper

customer_reviews.title: Quieter alternative to a .22 rifle
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful air rifle! It was as loud as a .22 rifle first 10 times I shot it, but has quieted down now considerably. Apparently this is caused by combustion of excess oil and is called "dieseling". This makes the gun loud until the oil is reduced. Search "umex dieseling" for important info on lubrication schedules. I experienced some trouble sighting in the the gun using the sights, almost ran out of adjustment left or right. I didn't spend a lot of time on it before installing the included scope. I'm pretty satisfied with the accuracy now, not as accurate as a .22 rifle, but good enough to hit a target the size of a red squirrel.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Albertson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, very nice !!!
customer_reviews.text: Made like a full size gun. Accurate, very good trigger, a bit heavy but nice balance. Good quality metalwork and stock,, VERY NICE OVERALL !!
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gun.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rifle, sounds like a .22 when fired excellent range and accuracy. Has good stopping power for rabbits and other small game.
customer_reviews.author: Hoywin

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: All that I expected or could ask for. Impressive performance
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bair

customer_reviews.title: More than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a pellet gun. I think I got a full fledged sniper rifle. It is heavy duty and wields like a real rifle. Loading it is easy. It is a single shot. Putting in the pellet in the chamber is a little difficult for me because I can't feel my finger tips too well.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Coale

customer_reviews.title: Perfection from Ruger
customer_reviews.text: Great, Ten shots to Bulls eye at 25 yards. Holds a half inch pattern consistently since. Only about a hundred rounds so far. Sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Roger  Ayres

customer_reviews.title: very powerful, solid, and loud
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Ruger Air Magnum .22 caliber Air Rifle for small game that was a nuisance. Shooting it for the first time really surprised me because of the power and somewhat loud. This Ruger .22 caliber is perfect and has surpassed my expectations. I am very satisfied with this product by Ruger.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Rifle
customer_reviews.text: Cocking the first couple of times was a bit harder than once it was broken in. Like the weighted feed and has worked great getting rid of those critters.
customer_reviews.author: la link

customer_reviews.title: Great gun - the scope is what you'd expect from ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gun - the scope is what you'd expect from one of these kits - and to be honest is pretty clear and seems to be well built. It's long, and a bit on the heavy side when compared to most pellet rifles, and very much on the loud side - still allot of fun to shoot - great power, easy plinker, and once you get it dialed in - it's a pretty lethal pest control tool.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: I'm using a holographic red dot for better acquisition so I can't say much about the scope
customer_reviews.text: Wicked powerful, but quite a kick. Its not a problem in itself except that it complicates the accuracy a bit. Its accurate enough to take magpies in my suburban home without disturbing the neighbors too much. I'm using a holographic red dot for better acquisition so I can't say much about the scope. I've never installed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: As advertised  just not very stealthy
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time and arrived undamaged, After reading all of the instructions I zeroed in the scope and did a little distance shooting. As with all Ruger products it lived up to my expectations. I must say it is as loud as my Ruger 10/22. I did try different weight ammo but to no avail. So when you fire this air rifle the neighbors (who are out on their deck) will hear it's crack.Over all excellent qaulity.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T.J.

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: seems well built, have but about 100 rounds through it, no issues yet, scope could be better but its usable. all around I would recommend this for small game 80 pounds and less. i received the product promptly with good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: RZK

customer_reviews.title: Ruger Air Magnum Combo Rifle
customer_reviews.text: The rifle has a "hard shoot" and may throw the scope off if the scope is not securely mounted with more than one screw. It is also quite heavy and hard to hold on the target for very long without a support of a tree or something. I had a Ruger before this but not the magnum, and it seemed to keep a "true" aim longer perhaps because of less recoil, and I have killed squirrels up to 80 yards with my former Ruger. I lie not!! However, someone wanted it more than I did and stole it off my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Arant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Well worth the money Best quality for the price two thumbs up for Amazon
customer_reviews.author: James W King

customer_reviews.title: I like the rifle it gets better the more it's fired
customer_reviews.text: I like the rifle it gets better the more it's fired.the scope is terrible. I ended up putting cabelas scope I bought for my 308, now the scope is worth more than rifle,but shoots really well
customer_reviews.author: JWS

customer_reviews.title: it is a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: shoots very accurate at 40 yards. it is a little loud for a air gun stock is too long. but in all nice gun.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a true rifle
customer_reviews.text: It's a bear !!! Still working in it or, it on me is in question. Feels like a true rifle. Great knockdown capability. Likes heavier pellets better. Going to iron sights as soon s weather warms up again. Scope was not up to capabilities of rifle. Overall, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: H. Michael Richards

customer_reviews.title: So powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful air rifle. Please be aware that if you want accuracy, you will need to use at least 10.5 grain Pellets. UPDATE 12/30: After mounting the scope and doing a couple of shots to adjust it, I tested it with a dove standing in the top of a tree at maybe 30-35 yards away... one shot one kill. I'm very happy with my purchase and it seems to be a great replacement for my old and loved .177 Slavia of 1985.
customer_reviews.author: Vidal Francisco

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten to play with it much. Looks and feels very real and very sturdy. Cocking effort isn't too bad.Love the scope but I need locktight it comes loose and you can damage scope by over tightening. It was pretty accurate with the scope right out of the box. I shot different types of ammo ranging in weight from 9gr to 28gr. I liked the heavies better and so did the rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW!!! This is the King Kong of air rifles.
customer_reviews.author: rob grimm

customer_reviews.title: really good rifle very accurate easy to shoot
customer_reviews.text: really good rifle very accurate easy to shoot had crossman venom before and this one is much better also very powerfull
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Malykhin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome rifle. louder then your normal pellet gun, its is incredibly powerful and accurate as well
customer_reviews.author: trevor

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: Holy Hell this thing is loud, and weighs as much as a shotgun....the power it unleashes! LOL This thing is well built, and came with a very nice scope! I ordered 30mm Cantilever Scope Mount Tri Rail Rings Picatinny Weaver Solid Aluminum Which fit right on it, but I didn't realize the tri rail was for a larger scope diameter. That was remedied with electrical tape bushings around the scope, worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ed

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was simply blown away by this rifle. I'm very impressed with the quality of the product. Can't wait to test its limits out.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: A gun not for the ladies
customer_reviews.text: This gun is not for the ladies. It is really tough to cock. Very loud but fun to shoot. Heavy, heavy gun.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran A. O'brien

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful not for amatures
customer_reviews.text: I am very experienced competition shooter.This rifle is difficult to shoot because of the recoil. It makes it very hard to follow through with your shot. Not good for long range but a pest killer for sure short range. I talking foxes and coyotes with hollow point round.
customer_reviews.author: Leatherneck

customer_reviews.title: Nice rifle.
customer_reviews.text: It is a little loud, but everything else is just as stated.
customer_reviews.author: oconee

customer_reviews.title: heavy powerful
customer_reviews.text: Heavy gun. Took about 50 rounds to sight the scope. Very powerful pellets pierced through 3/4 inch plywood
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: High Powered Air Rifle
customer_reviews.text: Rifle was bigger and better than expected. Plenty of power. Sounds like a 22 long rifle. Noise with me is not a problem. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: William Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Nailing squirrels across the back yard 100 feet or so. Accurate and powerful. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Beaufort Bruce

customer_reviews.title: not good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: not good as I expected, but it was brand new, and sometimes you have to work out the bugs. Others say its great.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

product_meta.title: Umarex Ruger Air Magnum Break Barrel Pellet Gun Air Rifle with 4x32mm Scope
product_meta.description: The Umarex 2244029 Ruger Air Magnum Break Barrel Single Shot 0.22-Caliber Air Rifle is ideal for small game, target shooting or pest control. The durable, all-weather construction is ready for any element. Designing, developing and marketing sport shooting products under the RWS, Walther, Hämmerli, Beretta, Colt, Smith & Wesson, HK, Ruger, Browning, Makarov, Tactical Force, Magnum Research and Combat Zone brands. Umarex USA offers world-class products for multiple product categories including adult airguns and air rifles, BB and pellet pistols, air soft guns, specialized airgun optics, performance airgun ammunition, airgun accessories and tactical training paintball guns.
feature_bullets: Durable built-in all-weather synthetic stock with a rubber recoil pad for comfort
Shoots .22 caliber pellets at up to 1000 fps
Adjustable fiber optic rear sight allows for easy sighting adjustments; Fixed fiber optic front sight for quick focusing
Includes a 4x32mm air rifle scope and scope mounting rings
Ideal for small game, target shooting or pest control
Equipt with fiber optic rear sight
